data.Title: Google Ads Reporting Outage
data.Description: Google is currently experiencing an outage affecting Google Ads reporting and some interfaces. The issue is ongoing, and Google is working on a resolution.

data.Title: Reddit Demands Payment for AI Training Data
data.Description: Reddit is demanding payment from companies like Microsoft that want to use its data for AI model training. The platform argues that its content holds value and should not be freely used for commercial purposes.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Volatility
data.Description: Google Search experienced significant ranking volatility, particularly in July, with notable fluctuations observed on July 19th and 26th. This volatility may indicate testing of new algorithms or an upcoming core update.

data.Title: Google Updates Algorithms to Demote Deepfakes
data.Description: Google has updated its algorithms to demote deepfake content in search results. The company aims to combat the spread of misleading and harmful AI-generated content, particularly explicit deepfakes.

data.Title: Google Tests Sitelinks Pill Format on Desktop
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new pill format for sitelinks in desktop search results. This change could impact how users interact with sitelinks and potentially affect click-through rates.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Introduces "More Found by Google" Reporting
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now includes a "More Found by Google" reporting feature for product feeds. This feature provides insights into how effectively Google surfaces products from merchants' feeds in search results.

data.Title: Google Knowledge Panels Experiment with "Videos From" Section
data.Description: Google is testing a new "Videos From" section within Knowledge Panels. This addition aims to provide users with more video content directly within the Knowledge Panel, enhancing the search experience.

data.Title: How Google Search Indexes JavaScript: A Report
data.Description: A new report delves into how Google Search indexes websites built with JavaScript. The research, based on analysis of over 100,000 Googlebot fetches, suggests that Google handles JavaScript effectively, indexing it almost as well as traditional web pages.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Adds New Commute Map Features
data.Description: Microsoft has enhanced the Commute map feature on its Bing Android app. Users can now add multiple destinations beyond home and work, improving the app's utility for commuters.

data.Title: Outbrain Acquires Teads in $1 Billion Deal
data.Description: Outbrain has confirmed the acquisition of Teads, a digital advertising company, for over $1 billion. The deal signifies consolidation in the ad tech industry.

data.Title: Google Updates Autocomplete System After Trump Criticism
data.Description: Google has made changes to its autocomplete and predictions systems following criticism related to former President Donald Trump. The company aims to address concerns about potential bias in its search suggestions.

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces Click-to-WhatsApp Messaging Assets
data.Description: Google Ads now supports click-to-WhatsApp messaging assets, allowing advertisers to directly engage with users on WhatsApp. This integration aims to enhance customer communication and drive conversions.

data.Title: Microsoft Advertising Search Ad Revenue Soars 19%
data.Description: Microsoft reported a 19% increase in search and advertising revenue, driven by growth in Microsoft Advertising. This surge marks a significant quarterly performance for the company's advertising business.

data.Title: Google "Hidden Gem Stores" Search Feature
data.Description: Google has introduced a new search feature that highlights "hidden gem stores." This feature aims to help users discover lesser-known local businesses, potentially benefiting smaller retailers.
